Caption: Prof. B. Sengupto (Director) and Mr. Hans Lenz (Minister for Scientific Research, Federal Republic of Germany) discuss the images in a photo album while Mr. Dubey (Secretary to the Registrar) assists in flipping the pages
Description: Mr. Hans Lenz (Minister for Scientific Research, Federal Republic of Germany, Bonn) visited IIT Madras on 30th January, 1964. A high tea ceremony was thrown in honour of his visit to the campus. During the ceremony, Mr. Hans Lenz interacted with the dignitaries, administrative staff and faculty members present. In the image, Prof. B. Sengupto (Director) and Mr. Hans Lenz discuss the images in a photo album while Mr. Dubey (Secretary to the Registrar) assists in flipping the pages.
